name: CodeineScheduleIIAndIII
title: Codeine Schedule II and III
description: This value set includes semantic clinical drugs (SCD) and generic pack (GPCK) RxNorm codes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to group schedule II and III codeine medications.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Medication.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that identify medications of schedule II and III codeine.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent schedule I, V,  unscheduled, nonprescribable, non-human, and inactive codeine medications.)
